sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.AjaxGetKFSAcctInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>AjaxGetKFSAcctInfo</name><script><![CDATA[var AjaxGetKFSAcctInfo = Class.create();
AjaxGetUserData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getUserName: function() {

        var user = this.getParameter('sysparm_acct_number');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_kfs_pinnacle');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', account_number);
        gr.query();
        gs.log(gr.getRowCount() + ' records found');

        if (gr.next()) {

            var obj = {};

            //obj.var1 = gr.department.name+''; //.name doesn't work after new york upgrade
            obj.var1 = gr.account_name.getDisplayValue();

            //obj.var2 = gr.manager+'';

            //obj.var3 = gr.user_name + '';

            //obj.var4 = gr.email+'';

            //obj.var5 = gr.u_ucistudentid+'';

            //obj.var6 = gr.employee_number+'';

            var json = new JSON();
            var answer = json.encode(obj);
            return answer;
        }
        type: 'AjaxGetKFSAcctInfo'
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 23:28:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>7163d9582fb859108968ea5ef699b68e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AjaxGetKFSAcctInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7163d9582fb859108968ea5ef699b68e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-15 23:43:01</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
